# Pearl Jam

This is two stacked [Masyus](https://puzz.link/rules.html?masyu) - each pearl from the middle grid goes in the same location in either the left grid or the right grid.  
The left grid is a regular Masyu.  
The right grid is a diagonal Masyu.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2022/pearlJam1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
